CREATE_TABLE_SUBTITLE: In this section you can create a custom 2x2 table object that will show up in the toolbar and be available to clone by dragging it into the tree view.
FIELDS_DESC: Insert new rows to the table and group them in sections.
PREVIEW_DESC: By default, when an object is created on a document all its rows will be displayed. Fortunately though you can hide the rows of your preference for a given table by editing its properties.
EDIT_PROJECT_SUBTITLE: Information relative to a project is not visible in the document view, however, it can be edited and displayed within this tab.
EDIT_DOCUMENT_SUBTITLE: Information relative to a document is not visible in the document view except from its title, however, all its other properties can be edited and displayed within this tab.
EDIT_OBJECT_SUBTITLE: Information relative to this object is not visible in the document view except from its title, however, all its other properties can be edited and displayed within this tab.
name: Name
title: Title
